name: recognizers-text
description: recognizers-text provides robust recognition and resolution of numbers, units, and date/time expressed in multiple languages. Support for English, Spanish, and Chinese (full); and French and Portuguese (partial).
author: Microsoft Corp.

scripts.prebuild-number: cd ./recognizers-number/ && npm install && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.prebuild-number-with-unit: cd ./recognizers-number-with-unit/ && npm install && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.prebuild-date-time: cd ./recognizers-date-time/ && npm install && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.prebuild-all: npm run prebuild-number && npm run prebuild-number-with-unit && npm run prebuild-date-time
scripts.prebuild: npm install --no-save ./recognizers-number/ ./recognizers-number-with-unit/ ./recognizers-date-time && rimraf dist && rimraf compiled
scripts.build: tsc && rollup -c && typedoc --out dist/docs --target es6 --theme minimal src
